title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects. I don't understand it.
OB: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get the following error message: 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'.
EB: I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. Also, it would be helpful to know the meaning of the error message.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Open a binary project. 2. Select the project. 3. Hit F4.
